system.description: You discern all spells and magical properties in a number of creatures or objects (one per caster level). Each round you may examine one creature or object you can see as a free action. For magic items: functions, how to activate, charges left. For objects/creatures with active spells: each spell, its effect, caster level. An attended object may attempt Will save (holder's choice); success means you learn nothing except what you can see; that object is immune to analyze dweomer for 24 hours. Does not function on artifacts.

components.materialDescription: A tiny lens of ruby or sapphire set in a small golden loop, worth at least 1,500 gp (focus).

system.target: One object or creature per caster level
system.savingThrow: None or Will negates; see text
